attributes.action: Rescind bonus payments to RBS management
attributes.additional_details: RBS, 83% owned by the UK Government, has cut thousands of jobs, has missed targets for lending to small and medium sized businesses, but still has awarded top management a bonus of £963,000.  We demand David Cameron, as representative of the largest RBS shareholder, the British taxpayer, act immediately to prevent this bonus from being awarded to management that has under-performed.
